testcase.name: Check if user can register in advantage bank portal
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to advantage bank url..................................passed And click on Register tab...................................................passed Then user enters all fields in the registration page........................passed And click on "Register" button..............................................passed Then User must be registered................................................passed

testcase.name: Check if user is able to login to Advantage bank
testcase.system-out: Given user logs into Advantage bank.........................................passed Then A default Log in window of Advantage Bank Portal Should Open...........passed

testcase.name: Check if all the navigation tabs are available and working
testcase.system-out: Given user logs into Advantage bank using registeration credentials.........passed Then A default Log in window of Advantage Bank Portal Should Open...........passed Then user click on "Accounts" tab on dashboard..............................passed Then user gets prompted with my accounts page...............................passed Then user click on "New Transfer" tab on dashboard..........................passed Then user click on "Loans" tab on dashboard.................................passed Then user click on "Cards" tab on dashboard.................................passed Then user click on "Forecasts" tab on dashboard.............................passed Then user click on "Stocks" tab on dashboard................................passed
